pageProduct.name: Ostelin Kids Milk Calcium & Vitamin D3 Liquid - Calcium & Vitamin D for Children - 90mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

A Calcium & Vitamin D3 supplement for kids from 7 months that kids will enjoy.

Calcium helps the development and maintenance of strong healthy bones and teeth.

Calcium made from real cow's milk

Natural creamy vanilla flavour

Vitamin D is an important nutrient for children's wellbeing as it:

? Helps to form and maintain strong bones
? Helps in the development and maintenance of teeth
? Boosts calcium absorption
? Supports bone mineralisation
? Supports strength and functioning of muscle
? Maintains a healthy immune system

Size: 90mL

KEY FEATURES

• • Suitable from 7 months
• Enclosed applicator allows for easy, accurate dosing.
• • Helps to form and maintain strong bones
• • Helps in the development and maintenance of teeth
• • Boosts calcium absorption
• • Supports bone mineralisation
• • Supports strength and functioning of muscle






Warnings

No Added Gluten, artificial colours, artificial flavours, artificial sweeteners, artificial preservatives.

Ingredients

Calcium (from hydroxyapatite) 100mg/1mL
Colecalciferol (Vitamin D3) 5 micrograms (200IU)/1mL

Contains: Contains lactose, milk/milk products, soya/soya bean products.


Directions

Infant 0-6 months: exclusive breastfeeding is recommended, consult your healthcare professional.
Infants 7 mnths to 1 year: Take 1 mL daily
Children 1 to 3 years: Take 2mL daily
Children 4 - 8 years: Take 3 mL daily
Children 9 to 13 years: Take 4 mL daily
